plot: Adaptation of Alexander Solzhenitsyn's story "Incident at Krechtovka Station." A railway station commander encounters a lost soldier during World War II.
title: Russian Night... 1941
plot_es: Adaptation of Alexander Solzhenitsyn's story "Incident at Krechtovka Station." A railway station commander encounters a lost soldier during World War II.
